titleStmt.title: For the alderman of the warde meanes deuised for better execution of the statute for reliefe of the poore, and redressing the disorders of persons vagarant [sic] and begging in the Citie of London.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London by Iohn Daye,
